head.title: Reliable Residential Roofing Services | RMR Construction & Remodeling
head.description: Protect your home with expert roofing services from RMR Construction & Remodeling. Serving Sacramento, Placer, and El Dorado Counties since 1989, we specialize in repairs, replacements, installations, and maintenance. Get a free estimate today and ensure your roof is durable, stylish, and built to last.
head.keywords: residential roofing, roof repairs, roof replacements, new roof installations, specialty roofing, roof maintenance, roof inspections, Sacramento roofing, Placer County roofing, RMR Construction & Remodeling
